additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Wheat Flour, Water, Rye flour (11%), Rye Meal (8%), Baker's Yeast, Wheat Gluten, Vinegar, Iodised Salt, Canola Oil, Soy Flour, Barley Malt Flour, Emulsifiers (481, 472e, 471), Vitamins (Thiamin, Folate).

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: Contains Cereals, Contains Gluten, Contains Soy

description: This dark (not-so) mysterious loaf has us all running for its deep and malty flavours. Our softer twist on the classic is baked with our home-grown rye flour and topped with a sprinkle of semolina to give a gentle crunch. It's perfect for a Reuben sandwich... or really any way you like it.
name: Light Rye Bread
